title: My Firefox screen has changed to an unusable mis-mash of stupid.  I have 3/4's of an inch to read my incoming emails.  I have changed nothing!  Did you?
content: My Firefox screen has change to the worse. I have only less than an inch of my screen to read anything. What happened? I have changed nothing here, don't even know how to.

title: Removing vertical lines in Reply
content:
I am using the same exact email but I change some data. Every time I click on Reply I get another vertical line on the left. How do I get rid these lines so the email looks like a virgin?

Thank you.

title: How to log in to more than 10 Gmail accounts
